segments.text: Oh no, look at that sinkâ€”water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and it's just spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor woman is standing right there, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But her dress is going to get soaked if she steps back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good over there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that shaky stool, stretching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, her arm up like she's begging.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make noise and startle her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, it's going to be slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden seems so calm in comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR
